textAfterTable: Who controls the gold? Click through the Olympic Powers timeline to discover key facts, political events and personalities that have defined the history of sport since the first modern Olympiad in 1896. US athletes LaShawn Merritt, Angelo Taylor, David Neville and Jeremy Wariner celebrate victory in the 4x400m relay final at the 2008 Beijing Olympic Games * Combines medals won by East and West Germany 2008 Beijing, China XXIX Olympiad 204 Nations 10,942 Athletes 302 Events 2008 Olympics Gold medals by nation Country Gold medals 1 China 51 2 United States 36 3 Russia 23 4 Great Britain 19 5 Germany 16 6 Australia 14 7 Other nations 143 Total 302 China climbs to the top,
